{{cleanup-linkrot|date=August 2011}} {{Infobox artist discography | Artist = [[T. Rex (band)|T. Rex]] | Image = | Caption = | Studio = 13 | Studio link = Studio albums | Live = 7 | Live link = Live albums | Compilation = 29 | Comp link = Compilation albums |2Option = 6 |2Option name = Box sets |2Option link = Box set |2Option color = orange | EP = 2 | EPs link = EPs | Singles = 29 | B-sides = | Soundtrack = | References = yes | Ref link = References }} [[T. Rex (band)|T. Rex]] were a British [[Rock music|rock]] band, formed in 1968 by singer/songwriter and guitarist [[Marc Bolan]]. The T. Rex [[discography]] consists of 4 "Tyrannosaurus Rex" and 9 "T. Rex" [[studio album]]s. Also 22 [[compilation album]]s, 7 [[live album]]s, 2 [[extended play]]s, 6 (Tyrannosaurus Rex) and 22 (T. Rex) [[singles]]. The group came to an end after Bolan's death in a car crash in September 1977. ==Studio albums== ;As Tyrannosaurus Rex {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" !rowspan="2"| Year !rowspan="2" width="350"| Title !colspan="2"|Chart position |-style="font-size:smaller;" !width="35"| [[UK Albums Chart|UK]]
